release.action: Fixed groupId tags of statcvs dependency.
The dependency on StatCvs-XML has been updated to version 0.9.3.
Bug #1660 has been fixed, statcvs-xml uses now the same JVM arguments as maven does (MAVEN_OPTS).
The dependency on StatCvs-XML has been updated to version 0.9.2.
The history feature has been rewritten. The plugin now checks out a complete copy of all 1.1 revisions to the target directory.
Property for include has been fixed and property for exclude has been added.
The generate goal has been split up, to allow for calling StatCvs-XML without download the cvs log.
The CVS connection string is now parsed from the pom.
The repository url is now checked for an empty value and not passed to StatCvs-XML in that case.
Migrated the plugin to use the new statcvs-xml jar (which generates XML xdoc output instead of HTML).
Creates maven.build.dir and maven.docs.dest directory if doesn't exist.
Register reports only if source, test,... exists. So, corresponding entrys in menu will appear only if reports are registered.
